channel.title: Making a safe zone
channel.description:
Hi, I think i am using a 317 client, I think its rune-kingdom source and im making a new home and skilling area.
But the problem is that the area's i want are not safe, so could someone please tell me how to make a safe zone?
Thanks Tom

item.title: Making a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @soi_spoon soi spoon
item.description:
@soi_spoon wrote:

client.java ctrl + f type nonwild
I cannot find that in my client.java :( 
	public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	if(isInPkBox()) return false;
		if (Type == 1) {
			if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 ||

But i did find that, does this mean that everywhere is safe, i just have to say where the wild is??

Read full topic

item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

do what lord dharok said then find the left bottom and right corner and put those coords in there
